channel.title: tags/gauss-markov-theorem on Connectome
channel.description: Recent content in tags/gauss-markov-theorem on Connectome

item.title: Link Articles
item.description: Articles can be linked by adding a the reference of the target post to the meta data of the current post, e.g., links: - snm/single-neuron-model.md - tags/gauss-markov-theorem The ref of the target post can be the path to the markdown file inside the content folder, such as snm/single-neuron-model.md, the path to the tag page, such as tags/gauss-markov-theorem. If one needs to find the ref of a post, it is found on the right of the content.

item.title: Link to Other Page Using Card
item.description: Apart from the normal markdown links, e.g., [this link](snm/single-neuron-model) we can also link to other page using the following code. {{< c "snm/single-neuron-model.md" >}} The result will be this: Single Neuron Models Single Neuron Models Neuron biological properties . By hovering on this link, a preview of the summary of the target post.
